subject: Re: Order #SSN4047, how did it go?
description_text:
It hasn't been delivered yet, so how can I write a review?

пт, 19 дек. 2025 г. в 19:13, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>:

> Hello Ivan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Іван Шаламов,     Since the order has not been fully delivered yet, there is no need to leave a review at this time. You are welcome to share your feedback after you receive and use all the items.  Thank you for your understanding and patience.
